Instruction: Prepare sushi rice according to package instructions and let cool.
Combine rice vinegar, sugar, and salt in a small bowl. Microwave for 30 seconds, stir, then pour over rice.
Combine tuna, mayonnaise, and sriracha in a bowl.
Slice avocado and cucumber into long thin strips.
Lay a sheet of nori shiny side down on a sushi rolling mat.
Spread a thin layer of sushi rice over the nori, leaving a top edge clear.
Place a line of tuna mixture down the center of the rice.
Add avocado and cucumber slices on top of the tuna.
Use the sushi mat to roll the sushi into a tight log.
Moisten the edge of the nori with water to seal.
Cut the roll into 8 equal pieces.
